title: Venus square Neptune
summary: Venus and Neptune rub at cross purposes, trading clarity for possibility. Mixed signals can slow decisions until facts are sorted. Grounding practices keep the inspiration useful.

meaning.headline: Mist and ideals test how values and relating stays clear.

frames.text: Neptune themes influence values and relating, shifting default patterns.
Expect movement; adaptability matters more than certainty.
There is room to experiment with how you respond.
Signals may arrive quickly; small, conscious steps keep you oriented.
A dramatic event is guaranteed to happen.

frictions: Escaping into fantasy instead of addressing basics
Overidealizing people or plans without verification
opportunities: Using symbolism or music to process feelings
Allowing softness to dissolve rigid stances
Resting or meditating to reset perception

do: Check facts before acting on a hunch
Create one grounded ritual to focus attention
Use creative outlets to translate intuition into form
Clarify boundaries kindly when signals feel blurry
Hydrate, rest, and simplify commitments to reduce overwhelm
avoid: Making promises while details are unclear
Using substances or distractions to dodge discomfort
Treating intuition as certainty without corroboration

reusable_lines.text: Stay receptive, then anchor the feeling in one clear step.
Let imagination flow, but give it a container before acting.

forbidden_claims: Predictions of psychic events or spiritual destiny
Certainty about hidden truths or revelations
Promises of bliss or inevitable confusion
allowed_framing: Process language about discernment and sensitivity
Agency framing around choices and boundaries
Conditional statements about clarity and context
